title: A table of the X. first persecutions of the primitiue time of Tiberius, vnto Constantinus Emperour
author: Foxe, John, 1516-1587.
publisher: A. I[slip,] F. K[ingston] and R. Y[oung,],
notes: Kingston alone pr. this. Page references in the text are to 11228, e.g. St. Peter is on p. 44; SS. Maturus and Sanctus on p. 62. -- STC.
O copy, reel 2024, is incomplete; one folio only.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
